text: Doğan Babacan (30 November 1929 – 18 May 2018) was a Turkish football referee. He was the first Turkish referee to supervise a match in FIFA World Cup history.Doğan Babacan kimdir? Kaş yaşında ve neden öldü? He was born in Istanbul. Later he was referee for the 1975 UEFA Super Cup final between FC Bayern Munich and FC Dynamo Kyiv. He retired from international refereeing in 1978. He died on 18 May 2018, aged 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Istanbul
title: Doğan Babacan
